main event: Numerous UFO sightings were reported in Easthampton, New York, between March 29 and August 5, 1966.
interesting points: Four identified UFO sightings from March to August 1966,The reliability of the witnesses is questioned due to lack of details,Several witnesses reported witnessing electrical disturbances coinciding with sightings,Witnesses included individuals driving through areas where sightings occurred,The case was deemed not warranting further investigation at the time.
witness description: Mr. & Mrs. Spicer, local newspaper reporters, and other residents
